name: EggXtremeCombat 2022
description:
EggXtremeCombat II is a high paced action fighting game with two chickens pinning up against each other for the title of strongest chicken. Can you become a chicken champion?

Controls:
Player 1
Movement: WASD
Attacks: JK L(only when airborne)
Player 2
Movement: Arrows
Attacks: Number Pad 4, 5, & 6 (only when airborne).
